page.title: 12OLD PEOPLE'S HOMES.
page.content:
{MARSTON COURT}is situated on the Marston Road. There are 49 residents at the most. There is a large garden, where the residents can sit in the summer. There are bells in every room so that the staff can be called if they're needed. In the words of one old lady, "It's nice here, we're all friends."
{RAYSON HOUSE}has been open since 1964. There are 21 warden controlled flats for the 23 residents. The warden and her husband live there for emergencies and general maintenance. The flats are visited by home helps, and meals on wheels are available.
